name: Floor is lava - FPS Controller demo with wallrun
name_original: Floor is lava - FPS Controller demo with wallrun
description:
Floor is lava - FPS Controller demo with wallrun is a platformer game developed by Bartha_Szabolcs. It was originally released in 2020.
You can play Floor is lava - FPS Controller demo with wallrun on PC, Linux and Web. The game is sold via itch.io.
